(Sorry LSK, but I was only using the Qwest Internet things as a one 
time thing, because of the problems Yanshosh has had. And I'm sure 
that those bots in the BW have heard of an IBM Computer, because all 
the autobots and decepticons were all fluent in human technology, and 
I'm sure that that knowledge was past on through the upgrade. And 
about your thing with Nemesis Inforcer, there's a problem. Because 
the Matrix is telling you to stop peace, but the Matrix was telling 
me and is telling child to make peace. What's with that?)

Starscream

"All right, thanks KitKat. Come on, Drillbit, let's find that little 
piece of explosive diareha waiting to happen.(Get it? Because fire 
comes out of his ass! Now that's creativity!)"

Starscream flys out of the base, scanning for Inferno.
______________________________________________________________________
Vulois

Vulois looks up, thinking he knows where Battera is. He sighs.

"All right, I'll leave. It's just that this image I saw really 
disturbed me. And if I have more, I'm going to go back to you. I'm 
sorry for the way I treated you. If we were friends before, I would 
like you to focus on that, and forgive me." Vulois flew out of the 
cave. Something inside him was burning up. Something was fighting. He 
flew and found a tree branch, wanting to think.
______________________________________________________________________
Gotron

Gotron arrived where Zardus was, and asked him:

"So, what did you call me for? I was in the process of spying on 
KitKat!" This wasn't true, but he wanted to look good infront of 
Zardus, his idle.
______________________________________________________________________
Prebon

Prebon sat there, with the canister containing Lightrade in his arms, 
and thought. This was the first big loss he ever had. He was dealing 
with the big guys now. He felt as disguraged as the time his father 
was incredibly mad at him for attacking the Maximal complex with 
Lightrade.(Refered to in the first chapter of Prebon's fanfic, which 
I am in the process of writing.) But he wasn't out yet. He still had 
Slayer. And Spears' programming would be fighting till the bitter 
end. And that Koj must be going nuts with the pain. Infact, this 
wasn't really a loss at all. If anything the Maximals are weaker and 
ready for a finished off attack. Maybe he would attack again soon, 
but not to finish them off. He needed a device to destory those anti-
chips they had in their brains, and that would take time. And in that 
time they would repair. But he will win this in the long run. What he 
needed was an partnership. A back-up. Some group who enjoyed violence 
as much as his did. He got up and immediatly went searching the 
database for his reasearch he made before he got here.
